Settings.QueryText: SELECT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Number, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Date, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Company, DocumentPurchaseOrder.OperationKind, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Contract, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ReceiptDate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentPurchaseOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncludeVATInPrice, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StructuralUnitReserve, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CustomerOrder, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CounterpartyPriceKind, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Event, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Responsible, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StructuralUnit, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Comment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PettyCash, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BankAccount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CashAssetsType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState, CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncomingDocumentNumber, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncomingDocumentDate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Author, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PointInTime, PurchaseOrdersBalances.QuantityBalance FROM AccumulationRegister.PurchaseOrders.Balance AS PurchaseOrdersBalances LEFT JOIN Document.PurchaseOrder AS DocumentPurchaseOrder ON PurchaseOrdersBalances.PurchaseOrder = DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref WHERE PurchaseOrdersBalances.QuantityBalance > 0 AND Not DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed
